akn:section.akn:heading: Improving uptake and patient access to integrated care services

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Duration A grant or cooperative agreement under this section shall be for a period not to exceed 5 years.
(f) Report on program outcomes An eligible entity receiving a grant or cooperative agreement under this section shall submit an annual report to the Secretary. Such annual report shall include—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Technical assistance for primary-behavioral health care integration

akn:content.akn:p: (g) Technical assistance for primary-behavioral health care integration

(h) Report to Congress Not later than 18 months after December 29, 2022, and annually thereafter, the Secretary shall submit a report to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate and the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives summarizing the information submitted in reports to the Secretary under subsection (f), including progress made in meeting performance metrics and the uptake of integrated care models, any adjustments made to target amounts pursuant to subsection (d)(2), and any other relevant information.
